channel.title: Comments on: Kuri at TED2018: The Age of Amazement
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Dori Nussbaum
item.dc:creator: Dori Nussbaum
item.description: Kuri, You’ve grown so fast! Even though I’m waiting , to see the advances you continue to make only evolving you into a better Kuri. I hope you can communicate with my dog. She loves to play fetch! I can’t wait. I work for Apple, no Kuri there! I hope you’ll have the ability to be open to both iOS and PC. So excited!
item.content:encoded:
Kuri,
You’ve grown so fast! Even though I’m waiting , to see the advances you continue to make only evolving you into a better Kuri. I hope you can communicate with my dog. She loves to play fetch!
I can’t wait. I work for Apple, no Kuri there! I hope you’ll have the ability to be open to both iOS and PC. So excited!
